General_Info.Title: Cog21
General_Info.Info: A Discord.Cog class that manages a game of Black Jack.

Commands.name: $play21 start
Commands.description: Starts the black jack game. All players automatically draw 2 cards.

Commands.name: $play21 hit
Commands.description: Adds a card to the player who called this command.

Commands.name: $play21 compare
Commands.description: Compares all player cards values. Who ever has the highest value under 21 wins. Players automatically draw 2 cards.

Commands.name: $play21 info
Commands.description: Displays all command information and game rules.

Rules.General: Who ever is the closest to 21 with the fewest amount cards win.

General_Info.Title: iCast
General_Info.Info: A Discord.Cog class that plays audio files and linked urls.
